samples.comment: The AI bot kept giving me irrelevant answers about Spark when I asked about BIAS FX. Had to wait 2 days to get a human agent.
Terrible experience. My Spark 40 has no sound and the support just told me to factory reset which I already did 3 times.
Asked for a refund and got passed around between 3 different agents over a week. Still no resolution.
The automated response was completely off topic. I asked about firmware update and got an answer about warranty.
Support agent was helpful but the issue is clearly a known bug that should have been fixed months ago.
